answers.answer: It may be anxiety, somtimes when I tend to get really anxious, I have heart palps, nausea, lighthead, feel like vomiting, but really never do, just once in awhile.
Can you get gastroparesis randomly without having diabetes?  Becuase that could be what it is, except I never have any diarrhea.

Yes, you can.  I dont have diabetes either.  I have post infectious gastroparesis, last winter when I got the stomah flu, i damaged a nerve in my stomach, therefore, I now have gastroparesis.  High fever, vomiting, diareha, etc can cause this nerve to become damaged and therefore causing gastroparesis.  It is most common in diabetes but can also be casue by an infection ( as in my case) and there are some cases that the cause  is unknown.
is bacteria can cause gastr0paresis?it si stressfull time for my son...any way to help

question: I have been experiencing unexplained nausea on and off for the past 5 months or so.  It started off with a sudden attack of it during a really stressful time, but the other times I've gotten it I wasn't stressed out, so I don't think that's what's causing it.  For a couple of weeks, I had some other symptoms along with it, like tachycardia and lightheadedness.  It was really frustrating and annoying because I had an echocardiogram and a head CT scan and both showed no problems.  Now I'm basically just getting the nausea, with the other symptoms only occasionally.  I have no abdominal pain at all and cannot notice a correlation with any particular foods that I eat.  Does anyone know what this could be??  I'm really tired of it becuase it gets so bad sometimes that I don't even want to go anywhere because I'm afraid I'll throw up everywhere (which has happened once ;-s)
title: Unexplained Nausea
